resources.string: This is the Onboarding Fragment, which runs when the user first opens the app
The Leanback sample shows how to quickly design apps designed for a 10-foot user interface
You can include the Leanback library through gradle in your own apps
Are you looking for guidance? This sample is available on GitHub so you can see how we built this.
